column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////What can I say
column2: a first time deep dish eater
column3: the sauce and sausage were amazing. The crust was crunchy and the cheese gushed out like it does in commercials. The staff and waitress were absolutely amazing. I even tried the salad
column4: with italitan salami bacon bit things...needless to say I am a tourist
column5: I haven't had all the deep dish Chicago has to offer
column6: but this was the best possible way to be introduced!
